channel.title: Need urgent help please!
channel.description: ok i started by changing all the startup screens and commands and the welcome screen dialogue to my servers name and all that good stuff. when i save it and compile it and restart the server it all still says the name of the old server. but when i go into my client.java all of it says my server name ??? idk whats going on and why it wont work please help me !!!

item.title: Need urgent help please!

do ya’ll know how to fix my problem ??. i can’t continue coding until i get this fixed :(. please help me !!

item.title: Need urgent help please!
item.dc:creator: @R_u_skeptical R_u_skeptical
item.description:
@R_u_skeptical wrote:

[quote=“godswords, post:5, topic:338594”]a usal wne would’ve something like

@echo off
title rs2hd compiler
echo Preparing…
mkdir bin
cd src
copy log4j.xml …
cd …
move log4j.xml bin/
echo Compiling core…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Compiling loginserver…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Compiling packet handlers…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/.java
echo Compiling logging system…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java
echo Complete.
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/.java
echo Complete.
pause[/quote]
No…? Thats not usual- Some people still have 32-bit pc guy- so the need the regular

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac

like this java code

item.title: Need urgent help please!
item.dc:creator: @godswords godswords
item.description:
@godswords wrote:

a usal wne would’ve something like

@echo off
title rs2hd compiler
echo Preparing…
mkdir bin
cd src
copy log4j.xml …
cd …
move log4j.xml bin/
echo Compiling core…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Compiling loginserver…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Compiling packet handlers…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/.java
echo Compiling logging system…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java
echo Complete.
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/.java
echo Complete.
pause

item.title: Need urgent help please!
item.dc:creator: @smerf45 smerf45
item.description:
@smerf45 wrote:

Here is my compiler code , ??!?!?!

@echo off @TITLE Digital Dogs if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit
